Generation V.Black: They use hypnosis to control people and Pokémon. Tales of Gothorita leading people astray are told in every corner.
Generation V.White: Starlight is the source of their power. At night, they mark star positions by using psychic power to float stones.
Generation V.Black 2: According to many old tales, it creates friends for itself by controlling sleeping children on starry nights.
Generation V.White 2: According to many old tales, it creates friends for itself by controlling sleeping children on starry nights.

Generation VI.X: Starlight is the source of their power. At night, they mark star positions by using psychic power to float stones.
Generation VI.Y: According to many old tales, it creates friends for itself by controlling sleeping children on starry nights.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Starlight is the source of their power. At night, they mark star positions by using psychic power to float stones.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: According to many old tales, it creates friends for itself by controlling sleeping children on starry nights.

Generation VIII.Sword: It's said that when stars shine in the night sky, this Pokémon will spirit away sleeping children. Some call it the Witch of Punishment.
Generation VIII.Shield: On nights when the stars shine, this Pokémon's psychic power is at its strongest. It's unknown just what link Gothorita has to the greater universe.

Generation IX.Scarlet: This Pokémon will hypnotize children to put them to sleep before carrying them away. Be wary of nights when the starlight is bright.
Generation IX.Violet: Using its psychic power, it arranges pebbles to form the shapes of constellations. Some people believe this Pokémon came from outer space.

Generation VI.X: Route 20 , Pokémon Village , Friend Safari ( Psychic )
Generation VI.Y: Route 20 , Pokémon Village , Friend Safari ( Psychic )

Generation VIII.Sword: Giant's Cap , Dusty Bowl Stony Wilderness , Watchtower Ruins ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Sword Expansion Pass: Slippery Slope , Frostpoint Field Giant's Bed , Snowslide Slope , Path to the Peak , Ballimere Lake ( Max Raid Battle )
